import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(RadarController,RadialLinearScale,// Scale for radar chart
CategoryScale,LinearScale,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const VehicleAttributesRadarChart=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;// Assuming 'data' is an array of vehicles
const labels=["Electric Range","Model Year","Postal Code"];const electricRange=data.map(vehicle=>vehicle["Electric Range"]);const modelYear=data.map(vehicle=>vehicle["Model Year"]);const postalCode=data.map(vehicle=>vehicle["Postal Code"]);const chartData={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:"Vehicle Attributes",data:[electricRange[0],modelYear[0],postalCode[0]],// Example of how to use data
backgroundColor:"rgba(0, 123, 255, 0.2)",borderColor:"#007bff",borderWidth:1}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Vehicle Attributes Comparison"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Radar,{data:chartData})]});};export default VehicleAttributesRadarChart;
